channel.title: Help
channel.description: ok i need help with makeing a npc drop what ever i want i know what to go to npcdrops.cfg but the problum is the npc i want to drop stuff isent on there i tried adding the npc to the npcdrops.cfg but it did nothing plz plz help this is what i added to npcdrops.cfg [code]npcdrop = 1456 5 526 1 313 10 1265 1 405 1 2677 1 403 2 401 1 [/code] see the npcdrop = 1456 wasent on there so i added it and it did nothing.
